Question.Subject: check the status of my email to see if it was "opened"?
Question.Content: I know theres websites that can hack into that sort of thing, like msngeeks.com for msn to see if someone blocked you or deleted you off your list but how can I tell if a email i sent through hotmail was opened. ..anyone know any lil tricks?
Question.UserNick: Jackie brown, yea that pop â™¡
Question.ChosenAnswer: go to www.didtheyreadit.com create an account there with the email address you are sending the emails from. and follow the instructions on the website on how to track and email u have sent. they will give you 10 trial open email confirmation.. after that you have to purchase if u want to continue using it.

Answer.Content: go to www.didtheyreadit.com create an account there with the email address you are sending the emails from. and follow the instructions on the website on how to track and email u have sent. they will give you 10 trial open email confirmation.. after that you have to purchase if u want to continue using it.
